column4: Latest;Sihanoukville: On the afternoon of April 1
column6: the 3 Chinese nationals who were selling unsanctioned COVID-19 testing kits were sent to court.------According to Lieutenant General Chhay Kim Khorn
column7: a spokesman for the National Police Commissar
column9: 11 of whom were educated and released and 3 were sent to court over the crackdown on distributors of the kits.------Five Chinese and nine Cambodians were arrested in Phnom Penh (10) Siem Reap (1) and Sihanoukville (2)
